attributes.action: Cap the cost of public ev chargers inline with electricity prices
attributes.additional_details: Your pushing evs, so at least make it affordable for those who have to rely on the public network of chargers.
attributes.background: I’d like the government to implement a cap on the cost ev charger suppliers can charge per kWh charging. After instavolt increaed their cost way above all others, and the unit price of electric

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638142
